title: Archiv für Rechts- und Wirtschaftsphilosophie

contents.note: JSTOR (full text also available for subscription or payment)

additional-notes: This is a German publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

The last issue in this range (July 1933) was published under the title 'Archiv für Rechtsphilosophie'.  Issues after that are noted under the title 'Archiv für Rechts- und Sozialphilosophie', which we describe in a separate record.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Ed Deegan for copyright research on this title.
